sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Card } from 'react-bootstrap'; import SVG from "react-inlinesvg"; import { toAbsoluteUrl } from "../../../../../../_metronic/_helpers"; import { CardBody } from '../../../../../../_metronic/_partials/controls'; import { format, parseISO } from 'date-fns'; export function VerifiedInprogresView( props) { const paymentVerification = props.paymentVerification; const paymentInfo = props.paymentInfo; const salesOfficerLocation = props.salesOfficerLocation; const paymentAdjustmentInfo = props.paymentAdjustmentInfo; const paymentAdjustmentCreatedByInfo = props.paymentAdjustmentCreatedByInfo; return ( <>
{format(parseISO(paymentAdjustmentInfo.mappingDate), 'HH:mm a')}
{format(parseISO(paymentInfo.mappingDate), 'dd MMM yyyy')}
{paymentAdjustmentCreatedByInfo.name}
{paymentAdjustmentCreatedByInfo.designation}
Payment Adjustment

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Integer nec odio. Praesent libero. Sed cursus ante dapibus diam. Sed nisi. Nulla quis sem at nibh elementum imperdiet. Duis sagittis ipsum.

{format(parseISO(paymentInfo.actionTakenDate), 'HH:mm a')}
{format(parseISO(paymentInfo.actionTakenDate), 'dd MMM yyyy')}
{paymentInfo.actionTakenBy.name}
{paymentInfo.collectionBy.designation.name}
Payment Verification {paymentVerification == "APPROVED" ? "Verified" : ""}

{paymentInfo.rejectReason}

{format(parseISO(paymentInfo.paymentDate), 'HH:mm a')}
{format(parseISO(paymentInfo.paymentDate), 'dd MMM yyyy')}
{paymentInfo.collectionBy.name}
{paymentInfo.collectionBy.designation.name}, {salesOfficerLocation.location_type} ({salesOfficerLocation.location_name})
Payment Collection

{paymentInfo.remarks}

); }
